author: Mr. Brightside's view
comment: It's been a few years, and as much as things went wrong, our time was so right. I'm thankful for that, for you. I know it's been time to move on for a while, since you did a while ago. If be lying if I said I wont always love you, because I will, that feeling may have changed slightly, maybe become more volatile as my emotions do tend to immolate me, but they will never fade. I know we said it before, and ive said it more times than I can count hoping to feel what I say and let go, but maybe this time will be different. Goodbye my first love who is the source of all these churning emotions. Always and Forever.

author: Adrian Paul
comment: You will definitely will ! A loser like me, with quite a depressing past, with a lot of hard work and commitment managed to find some good sides inside and took them out. This lead to overall feeling better and I actually managed to have a girlfriend as well. We split apart recently but I still feel grateful for what she gave to me. Remember, work hard on yourself and dont give up, but feeling well alone is not the last step. You will find someone who will appreciate you for who you are and will love you no matter the circumstances. But you need to be ready for it and be the one for her as well. You will succeed in life, and find a purpose, dont worry. The strongest and loveliest people in the world are the most sensible and who does know how it is to feel bad.

comment: My friend showed me this song yesterday....I'm currently going through a break up, me and her are still friends and trying to get through it one day at a time... but whenever I have the chance to see her I'd like to show her this song...it describes exactly how I feel...even though she left I can tell she feels extremely guilty about betraying me. She probably knows I'm hurting to...and she's not ready to confess, but I want her to know that I do forgive her when she's ready to confess.
